title: Ancient Cipher
description: Decode the mysterious message on the wall using the Caesar cipher.
hints: This is a Caesar cipher. Each letter is shifted by the same amount.
The shift amount is 3. A becomes D, B becomes E, etc.
Work backwards: H becomes E, V becomes S, etc.

title: Symbol Sequence
description: Complete the pattern by selecting the next symbol in the sequence.
hints: Look at the alternating pattern of the symbols.
The sequence alternates between two symbols.
The pattern is: empty, filled, empty, filled, empty... what comes next?

title: Logic Grid
description: Use the clues to determine which key opens which lock.
clues: The bronze key does not open the first lock.
The silver key opens the lock that comes before the bronze key's lock.
The gold key opens the middle lock.
hints: Start with the definitive clue: the gold key opens the middle lock.
If gold opens lock2, then silver must open lock1 (comes before).
That leaves bronze for lock3, which matches the first clue.

title: Hidden Numbers
description: Find all the hidden numbers in the room to unlock the combination.
hints: Look carefully at the corners and edges of the room.
Some numbers might be partially hidden behind objects.
The combination is in the order you find them: top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left.

title: Final Riddle
description: Solve the riddle to find the final piece of the escape mechanism.
riddle: I am not a river, but I flow. I am not alive, but I grow. I can be wasted, saved, or spent. What am I?
hints: Think about something that moves forward constantly.
This thing can be managed but never stopped.
Everyone has the same amount of it each day, but uses it differently.
